caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. By a lakeside, a man and a woman were engaged in conversation, appearing to be a couple. The man was wiping a sword in his hand, and his expression was filled with guilt. It seemed that he had done something to betray the trust of the woman. Meanwhile, in a palace, some people were preparing dinner. In a small room, several shirtless men were getting their hair cut. A child was climbing a wall, and when he descended, his mother scolded him.Shortly after, a group of horsemen entered the city, and everyone knelt to greet them. It appeared that the arriving figure was the king. The king then warmly embraced and conversed with a man, indicating they were good friends.
